item.title: NEM
item.description: score:-66 Chances: Gold price is currently more than $300 above the fourth-quarter average. Mining stocks like Barrick Gold and Newmont have performed poorly this year despite the rise in gold price. Risks: Gold declined after reaching a fresh record, indicating a possible profit booking in the overextended price rally.
